citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
* A facility representative was not available on 04/09/15 at 1:30 PM to do a facility inspection.
* Inspector knocked on front door to the house of the licensee. Inspector then honked GOV horn and called
telephone number given by licensee. Per phone conservation licensee stated that they had prior commitments and
would not be home in an acceptable time to do a facility inspection.
* Copy of inspection report was sent by regular mail.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
*  A facility representative was not available on 04/09/15 at  1:30 PM to do a facility inspection.
*  Inspector knocked on front door to the house of the licensee.  Inspector then honked GOV horn and called
telephone number given by licensee.  Per phone conservation licensee stated that they had prior commitments and
would not be home in an acceptable time to do a facility inspection.
*  Copy of inspection report was sent by regular mail.
